questions.question: Industrial smog primarily arises from the combustion of:
questions.explanation: Industrial smog is a result of coal and oil combustion [S1].

questions.question: According to [S2], what characterizes air pollution?
questions.explanation: Air pollution is defined in [S2] as harmful substances in high concentrations.

questions.question: Which gases react with water to form acid rain?
questions.explanation: Sulfur dioxide (SO2) and nitrogen oxides (NOx) react with water to form sulfuric and nitric acids, respectively [S3].

questions.question: Which topic is covered, according to [S4]?
questions.explanation: Air pollution is listed as a topic in [S4].
